endpoint.name: Default Endpoint
endpoint.desc: Default Endpoint to use on "Connect" action.

on-open.description: Triggered when connection with server is opened.

on-client-error.description: Triggered when an error happened on the server.

on-close.description: Triggered when connection with server is closed.

on-join-room.description: Triggered when joined successfully into a room.

on-leave-room.description: Triggered when left from a room.

on-room-error.description: Triggered when an error happened on the server.

on-room-message.description: Triggered when the room broadcasts a message, or sends a message directly to this client.

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type of the message being sent/broadcasted.

on-room-statechange.description: Triggered when the state of the room changes.

room-listen.description: Triggered when a variable at the selected path changes.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities/:id/:axis"

operation.name: Operation
operation.desc: You may limit to listen for "add", "replace" or "remove" operations on this variable. "any" catches any operations.

schema-item-add.description: Triggers when an item is added to ArraySchema or MapSchema.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities"

schema-field-change.description: Triggers when a field is changed inside a Schema instance.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities"

schema-item-change.description: Triggers when an item is changed inside ArraySchema or MapSchema.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities"

schema-item-remove.description: Triggers when an item is removed from ArraySchema or MapSchema.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities"

schema-is-index.description: Check if index of current item is equals to provided value.

endpoint.name: Endpoint
endpoint.desc: Connect to {0} endpoint. If empty, uses the Default Endpoint property from the global Colyseus object type.

message.name: Message
message.desc: JSON representation of the message. Messages arrive on server-side at "onMessage".

data.name: Data
data.desc: Plain JavaScript Object inside a string

current-value-at.description: Get nested value from current item

variable.name: Variable
variable.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "messages.0"

current-index.description: Get current index of a Schema item. Available during "On Add", "On Change" or "On Remove"

state-value.description: Get a value from room's state

variable.name: Variable
variable.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "messages.0"

session-id.description: Unique sessionId of the current user
